sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import * as R from 'ramda' import { fetchclothes, loadMoreclothes, addclotheToBasket, fetchCategories, fetchSize } from 'actions' import {getclothes, getclothe} from 'selectors' import Layout from 'containers/layout' class clothes extends Component { componentDidMount() { this.props.fetchclothes() this.props.fetchCategories() this.props.fetchSize() } renderclothe(clothe, index) { const {addclotheToBasket} = this.props const shortDescription = `${R.take(60, clothe.description)}...` return (

{clothe.price}$

{clothe.name}

{shortDescription}

More info

) } render() { const {clothes, loadMoreclothes} = this.props return (
{clothes.map((clothe, index) => this.renderclothe(clothe, index))}
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state, ownProps) => ({ clothes: getclothes(state, ownProps) }) const mapDispatchToProps = { fetchclothes, loadMoreclothes, addclotheToBasket, fetchCategories, fetchSize } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(clothes)
